advice_name: Hisense 58" Class 4K UHD LCD Roku Smart TV HDR R6 Series 58R6E3
advice_description: The Hisense 58" Class 4K UHD HDR Roku Smart TV is designed with a gorgeous bezel-less design and packs incredible detail into its 4K Ultra HD Dolby Vision HDR-enhanced display. Plus, with Roku TV, it's easy to watch what you love with quick access to thousands of streaming channels, and live TV. More than a smart TV, the Hisense 58" Class 4K UHD HDR Roku Smart TV is a better TV.
